dct_title_s: Coal City, Jefferson Township, Arney P.O.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by profile. 13 columnar sections showing coal measures and location map for Jefferson Township, including Coal City and Arney, in Owen County, Indiana. Includes geological profiles for Jefferson Township, including Coal City and Arney. Plate XXVII. Detached from: The coal deposits of Indiana / George Hall Ashley. In Indiana Department of Geology and Natural Resources twenty-third annual report, 1898. Indianapolis : Wm. B. Burford, 1899. Page 496.
Imprint: [Indianapolis] : [Wm. B. Burford], [1899]; Imprint: [Indianapolis] : [Indiana, Dept. of Geology and Natural History], [1899]
Dimensions: 23 x 27 cm; Scale: Approximately 1:63,360. Vertical scale varies
dct_publisher_sm: Indiana. Department of Geology and Natural Resources
